name: unthrifty
content:
unthrifty adjective
(CARELESS WITH MONEY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not using money carefully and not avoiding waste: The people were described as lazy and unthrifty. Thrift is often seen as being a virtue in itself, and this puts us off unthrifty practices such as generosity and feasting.
